channel.title: [Poll] Prefered Saving Types
channel.description:
[b]Text:[/b] Very well known, and EXTEMELY easy for even the noobiest of noobs. Requires Compiling to update data though, and Uses more memory than other options.
[b]SQL:[/b] Known to many, set up of a server can be hard for many... ill-experianced users. But opens up a whole new array of posibilities to how you can run your server. Allows you to update Data without having to recompile. Thought to be more lag free.
[b]Data:[/b] You probably saw these all the time in old sources. They were basically .txt files. Just a little cooler looking.
Please post anyother saving options you may think of. With the exception of Client-Side saving of anykind.
